view render.description: Builds the output based upon a file name and any data that has already been set.

view renderString.description: Builds the output based upon a string and any data that has already been set.

view excerpt.description: Extract first bit of a long string and add ellipsis

view setData.description: Sets several pieces of view data at once.

view setVar.description: Sets a single piece of view data.

view resetData.description: Removes all of the view data from the system.

view getData.description: Returns the current data that will be displayed in the view.

view extend.description: Specifies that the current view should extend an existing layout.

view section.description: Starts holds content for a section within the layout.

view include.description: Used within layout views to include additional views.

view getPerformanceData.description: Returns the performance data that might have been collected during the execution. Used primarily in the Debug Toolbar.
